languages.text: "Твои глаза видят отблески Ша'эиль, а душа всегда открыта тому, что за вуалью... Отчего же твои способности пугают мон-кай меньше, чем способности усмиренной?"
"Your eyes see reflections of Sha'eil, and your soul is always open to what lies beyond the veil... Why is it that your abilities frighten the mon-keigh less than those of the quieted one?"
languages.original_text: "Твои глаза видят отблески Ша'эиль, а душа всегда открыта тому, что за вуалью... Отчего же твои способности пугают мон-кай меньше, чем способности усмиренной?"

traits.locale_text: "Your eyes see reflections of Sha'eil, and your soul is always open to what lies beyond the veil... Why is it that your abilities frighten the mon-keigh less than those of the quieted one?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your eyes see reflections of Sha'eil, and your soul is always open to what lies beyond the veil... Why is it that your abilities frighten the mon-keigh less than those of the quieted one?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your eyes see reflections of Sha'eil, and your soul is always open to what lies beyond the veil... Why is it that your abilities frighten the mon-keigh less than those of the quieted one?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your eyes see reflections of Sha'eil, and your soul is always open to what lies beyond the veil... Why is it that your abilities frighten the mon-keigh less than those of the quieted one?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “你的双眼能看见纱芮尔的倒影，你的灵魂始终向面纱之后的东西敞开……为什么比起那个获得安宁的人，你的能力更让那些猴子感到害怕呢？”
languages.original_text: "Your eyes see reflections of Sha'eil, and your soul is always open to what lies beyond the veil... Why is it that your abilities frighten the mon-keigh less than those of the quieted one?"

traits.locale_text: “你的双眼能看见纱芮尔的倒影，你的灵魂始终向面纱之后的东西敞开……为什么比起那个获得安宁的人，你的能力更让那些猴子感到害怕呢？”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Vos yeux perçoivent des reflets du Sha'eil et votre âme est toujours ouverte à ce qui se passe de l'autre côté du voile... Pourquoi vos capacités effraient-elles moins les mon-keigh que celles des autres ? »
languages.original_text: "Your eyes see reflections of Sha'eil, and your soul is always open to what lies beyond the veil... Why is it that your abilities frighten the mon-keigh less than those of the quieted one?"

traits.locale_text: « Vos yeux perçoivent des reflets du Sha'eil et votre âme est toujours ouverte à ce qui se passe de l'autre côté du voile... Pourquoi vos capacités effraient-elles moins les mon-keigh que celles des autres ? »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Tus ojos ven reflejos del Sha'eil y tu alma siempre está abierta a lo que hay tras el velo... ¿Por qué los otros mon-keigh tienen menos miedo a tus habilidades que a las de la silenciada?».
languages.original_text: "Your eyes see reflections of Sha'eil, and your soul is always open to what lies beyond the veil... Why is it that your abilities frighten the mon-keigh less than those of the quieted one?"

traits.locale_text: «Tus ojos ven reflejos del Sha'eil y tu alma siempre está abierta a lo que hay tras el velo... ¿Por qué los otros mon-keigh tienen menos miedo a tus habilidades que a las de la silenciada?».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「その目はシャーエイルの鏡であり、その魂はいつもヴェールの向こう側に存在している…なぜあなたの能力はモン＝ケイを恐れさせ、決して平穏を与えないのだと思う？」
languages.original_text: "Your eyes see reflections of Sha'eil, and your soul is always open to what lies beyond the veil... Why is it that your abilities frighten the mon-keigh less than those of the quieted one?"

traits.locale_text: 「その目はシャーエイルの鏡であり、その魂はいつもヴェールの向こう側に存在している…なぜあなたの能力はモン＝ケイを恐れさせ、決して平穏を与えないのだと思う？」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Eure Augen sehen Reflexionen von Sha'eil, und Eure Seele ist immer für das geöffnet, was jenseits des Schleiers liegt ... Warum ängstigen Eure Fähigkeiten die Chem-Pan-Sey mehr als die des Verstummten?"
languages.original_text: "Your eyes see reflections of Sha'eil, and your soul is always open to what lies beyond the veil... Why is it that your abilities frighten the mon-keigh less than those of the quieted one?"

traits.locale_text: "Eure Augen sehen Reflexionen von Sha'eil, und Eure Seele ist immer für das geöffnet, was jenseits des Schleiers liegt ... Warum ängstigen Eure Fähigkeiten die Chem-Pan-Sey mehr als die des Verstummten?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "Your eyes see reflections of Sha'eil, and your soul is always open to what lies beyond the veil... Why is it that your abilities frighten the mon-keigh less than those of the quieted one?"

languages.text: "Gözlerin, Sha'eil'in yansımalarını görüyor, ruhunsa her daim örtünün ardında yatanlara açık... Becerilerin neden mon-keighleri sessiz olanınkilerden daha çok korkutuyor?"
languages.original_text: "Your eyes see reflections of Sha'eil, and your soul is always open to what lies beyond the veil... Why is it that your abilities frighten the mon-keigh less than those of the quieted one?"

traits.locale_text: "Gözlerin, Sha'eil'in yansımalarını görüyor, ruhunsa her daim örtünün ardında yatanlara açık... Becerilerin neden mon-keighleri sessiz olanınkilerden daha çok korkutuyor?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
